name: Kneeler Boot - Compound Fastened
description: A three-piece boot system with a rigid PLA upper shell, a soft TPU floor pad, and a mechanical fastener to secure the boot to the kneeler leg — no glue required.

printSettings.upperBoot: Polymaker PLA Pro (Black) | 4 Wall Loops | 35% Gyroid Infill
printSettings.floorPad: TPU 90A | 4 Wall Loops | 35% Gyroid Infill | Print Speed < 40mm/s

assemblyGuide: Clean surfaces: remove any stringing from the internal wedge cavity.
Press-Fit: press the TPU floor pad wedge into the PLA cavity until flush.
Slide the boot assembly onto the kneeler leg.
Secure with the included fastener — no adhesive needed.
